item.title: Apply
item.dc:creator: rishabh
item.content:encoded:
, we are currently underwriting your funding for up to $50,000 and just need to verify your business revenue.

4 out of 5 people that connect via Plaid receive funding within 24 hours!

Linking your bank is the fastest way to get approved. It does not give us the ability to access your bank account, only to view transactions and verify revenue (so your information will never be at risk).

  • Quicker approval
  • Funds within hours if qualified
  • Secure data protection from Plaid
Connect with Plaid Skip this step, I'll upload my bank statements manually. back

Business Revenue Verification

Let's confirm your business revenue and account where funds will be deposited.
Please upload your last THREE bank statements of the primary business checking account.
CA and NY business owners:

Please upload the last FOUR months of bank statements.

Oct 2025 Statement

Drag and drop here or

click to upload

Nov 2025 Statement

Drag and drop here or

click to upload

Dec 2025 Statement

Drag and drop here or

click to upload

Jan 2026 Statement

Drag and drop here or

click to upload

Accepted file types: PDF only, Max. file size: 10 MB, Max. files: 4.

Upload documents

Skip this step, I'll email them manually.

back

Business Information

Please provide your complete business details below.
back

Owner Information

Please provide your personal information so we can create your advance agreement.
back

Identity Verification

For security purposes we need to verify your identity.
Please upload a clear picture of your Driver License.

Please use landscape orientation and ensure that your Driver's License photo is clear and readable.

Apply Online

Start by completing our quick and easy online application. It only takes a few minutes to provide the required information and submit your request for review.

Quick Funding Review

Our specialists promptly evaluate your application, typically completing the underwriting process within 1–2 hours for a fast and efficient assessment.

Same-Day Approval

After the review, our approval team will connect with you to discuss your goals and finalize the terms — often leading to same-day approval so your plans stay on schedule.

Fast Fund Transfer

Once approved, we move quickly to transfer funds directly to your business account, often via same-day wire or next-day ACH, giving you immediate access to the capital you need.

item.content:encoded:
, we are currently underwriting your funding for up to $50,000 and just need to verify your business revenue.

4 out of 5 people that connect via Plaid receive funding within 24 hours!

Business Information

Please provide your complete business details below.
back

Owner Information

back

Identity Verification

For security purposes we need to verify your identity.
Please upload a clear picture of your Driver License.

Please use landscape orientation and ensure that your Driver's License photo is clear and readable.

back
ALMOST DONE!

Funding Account Information

Please upload a VOIDED check so we know where to deposit your funds.
This must match the account used for Plaid or bank statements.

Please use landscape orientation and ensure that your voided check photo is clear and readable.

back
ALMOST DONE!

Funding Account Information

Thanks for your application,

Our funding specialists will be in touch with you within a few hours once your file has been reviewed and will be calling you from (424)-253-0536.

Want funding faster?

5 out of 6 people that provide additional details get funded within 24 hours!
This will not affect our final decision. This simply routes you to the right specialist.

By signing the application, each person listed business and business owner(s)/officer(s) (individually and collectively, “you”) certify that you are authorized to sign on behalf of the named business, all information and supporting documentation submitted with this application are true, correct and complete, and all such information may be relied upon by Crystal Capital LLC (“Crystal Capital”) and the Recipients (defined below). You hereby authorize Crystal Capital and each of its representatives, successors, assigns, designees and third-party funding partners, which includes lenders and other finance providers with whom Crystal Capital has, or may in the future enter into, commercial-brokerage-financing relationships (“Recipients”): (1) to obtain consumer or personal, business and investigative reports and other information about you, including hard and/or soft credit pulls, from one or more consumer reporting agencies, such as TransUnion, Experian and Equifax; (2) to obtain credit card processor statements and bank statements from banks, creditors and other third parties; (3) to obtain the release, by any creditor or financial institution, of any information relating to you, to any Recipients; (4) to transmit this application form, along with any of the foregoing information obtained in connection with this application, to any or all Recipients for the foregoing purposes; and (5) to contact you via e-mail, call and/or text-message at the e-mail address and/or phone number provided above, or at any e-mail address and/or phone number reasonably identified as belonging to you, including wireless numbers (if applicable), even if listed on a Do-Not-Call registry, using an automated telephone dialing system or other similar system with respect to this application, future related commercial-financing opportunities and/or other lawful telemarketing purposes. You further certify that should any of the foregoing information change, to the extent within your knowledge, that you will promptly notify Crystal Capital of such changes.

item.title: Apply
item.dc:creator: rishabh
item.content:encoded:
, we are currently underwriting your funding for up to $50,000 and just need to verify your business revenue.

4 out of 5 people that connect via Plaid receive funding within 24 hours!

Linking your bank is the fastest way to get approved. It does not give us the ability to access your bank account, only to view transactions and verify revenue (so your information will never be at risk).

  • Quicker approval
  • Funds within hours if qualified
  • Secure data protection from Plaid
Connect with Plaid Skip this step, I'll upload my bank statements manually. back

Business Revenue Verification

Let's confirm your business revenue and account where funds will be deposited.
Please upload your last THREE bank statements of the primary business checking account.
CA and NY business owners:
Please upload the last FOUR months of bank statements.​
Skip this step, I'll email them manually.
back

Business Information

Please provide your complete business details below.
back

Owner Information

Please provide your personal information so we can create your advance agreement.
back

Identity Verification

For security purposes we need to verify your identity.
Please upload a clear picture of your Driver License.

Please use landscape orientation and ensure that your Driver's License photo is clear and readable.

back
ALMOST DONE!

Funding Account Information

Please upload a VOIDED check so we know where to deposit your funds.
This must match the account used for Plaid or bank statements.

Please use landscape orientation and ensure that your voided check photo is clear and readable.

back
ALMOST DONE!

Funding Account Information

Thanks for your application,

Our funding specialists will be in touch with you within a few hours once your file has been reviewed and will be calling you from (424)-253-0536.

Want funding faster?

5 out of 6 people that provide additional details get funded within 24 hours!
This will not affect our final decision. This simply routes you to the right specialist.

By signing the application, each person listed business and business owner(s)/officer(s) (individually and collectively, “you”) certify that you are authorized to sign on behalf of the named business, all information and supporting documentation submitted with this application are true, correct and complete, and all such information may be relied upon by Crystal Capital LLC (“Crystal Capital”) and the Recipients (defined below). You hereby authorize Crystal Capital and each of its representatives, successors, assigns, designees and third-party funding partners, which includes lenders and other finance providers with whom Crystal Capital has, or may in the future enter into, commercial-brokerage-financing relationships (“Recipients”): (1) to obtain consumer or personal, business and investigative reports and other information about you, including hard and/or soft credit pulls, from one or more consumer reporting agencies, such as TransUnion, Experian and Equifax; (2) to obtain credit card processor statements and bank statements from banks, creditors and other third parties; (3) to obtain the release, by any creditor or financial institution, of any information relating to you, to any Recipients; (4) to transmit this application form, along with any of the foregoing information obtained in connection with this application, to any or all Recipients for the foregoing purposes; and (5) to contact you via e-mail, call and/or text-message at the e-mail address and/or phone number provided above, or at any e-mail address and/or phone number reasonably identified as belonging to you, including wireless numbers (if applicable), even if listed on a Do-Not-Call registry, using an automated telephone dialing system or other similar system with respect to this application, future related commercial-financing opportunities and/or other lawful telemarketing purposes. You further certify that should any of the foregoing information change, to the extent within your knowledge, that you will promptly notify Crystal Capital of such changes.

By signing the application, each person listed business and business owner(s)/officer(s) (individually and collectively, “you”) certify that you are authorized to sign on behalf of the named business, all information and supporting documentation submitted with this application are true, correct and complete, and all such information may be relied upon by Crystal Capital LLC (“Crystal Capital”) and the Recipients (defined below). You hereby authorize Crystal Capital and each of its representatives, successors, assigns, designees and third-party funding partners, which includes lenders and other finance providers with whom Crystal Capital has, or may in the future enter into, commercial-brokerage-financing relationships (“Recipients”): (1) to obtain consumer or personal, business and investigative reports and other information about you, including hard and/or soft credit pulls, from one or more consumer reporting agencies, such as TransUnion, Experian and Equifax; (2) to obtain credit card processor statements and bank statements from banks, creditors and other third parties; (3) to obtain the release, by any creditor or financial institution, of any information relating to you, to any Recipients; (4) to transmit this application form, along with any of the foregoing information obtained in connection with this application, to any or all Recipients for the foregoing purposes; and (5) to contact you via e-mail, call and/or text-message at the e-mail address and/or phone number provided above, or at any e-mail address and/or phone number reasonably identified as belonging to you, including wireless numbers (if applicable), even if listed on a Do-Not-Call registry, using an automated telephone dialing system or other similar system with respect to this application, future related commercial-financing opportunities and/or other lawful telemarketing purposes. You further certify that should any of the foregoing information change, to the extent within your knowledge, that you will promptly notify Crystal Capital of such changes.

You hereby authorize Crystal Capital and each of its representatives, successors, assigns, designees and third-party funding partners, which includes lenders and other finance providers with whom Crystal Capital has, or may in the future enter into, commercial-brokerage-financing relationships (“Recipients”): (1) to obtain consumer or personal, business and investigative reports and other information about you, including hard and/or soft credit pulls, from one or more consumer reporting agencies, such as TransUnion, Experian and Equifax; (2) to obtain credit card processor statements and bank statements from banks, creditors and other third parties; (3) to obtain the release, by any creditor or financial institution, of any information relating to you, to any Recipients; (4) to transmit this application form, along with any of the foregoing information obtained in connection with this application, to any or all Recipients for the foregoing purposes; and (5) to contact you via e-mail, call and/or text-message at the e-mail address and/or phone number provided above, or at any e-mail address and/or phone number reasonably identified as belonging to you, including wireless numbers (if applicable), even if listed on a Do-Not-Call registry, using an automated telephone dialing system or other similar system with respect to this application, future related commercial-financing opportunities and/or other lawful telemarketing purposes. You further certify that should any of the foregoing information change, to the extent within your knowledge, that you will promptly notify Crystal Capital of such changes.
